title.rendered: The Opening Bell: Restaurants are Ready for Spring

content.rendered: Believe it or not, the recent polar vortex that capped off our winter actually sent some restaurants out of business according to Doug Roth. That was one of the big headlines Doug brought in studio with Steve Grzanich, but the two also touched on the fluctuation of delivery & meal prep impacts along with the way we are teaching the ways of hospitality.
